abstract_summ: Test positive rate, test per confirmed case, recovery rate, case fatality rate, and percent distribution of active cases were computed.To assess the previous and current Covid-19 situations in these states indicators such as Active rates, Recovery rate, Case fatality rate, Test positivity rate, tests per million, cases per million, test per confirmed case has been used.The coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic, which originated in the city of Wuhan, China, has quickly spread to various countries, with many cases having been reported worldwide.The outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has caused more than 80 813 confirmed cases in all provinces of China, and 21 110 cases reported in 93 countries of six continents as of 7 March 2020 since middle December 2019.Given such an increase and unlocked India, Delhi might soon enter into the third stage of community transmission where source of 50 percent or more cases would be unknown.
title_summ: Burden of COVID-19 pandemic in India: Perspectives from Health InfrastructureCOVID-19 outbreak: Migration, effects on society, global environment and preventionCould fighting airborne transmission be the next line of defence against COVID-19 spread?Non Pharmaceutical Interventions for Optimal Control of COVID-19Social and administrative issues related to the COVID-19 pandemic in Pakistan: better late than neverUnder the epidemic situation of COVID‐19, should special attention to pregnant women be given?The Rise and Impact of COVID-19 in IndiaCOVID 19 in INDIA: Strategies to combat from combination threat of life and livelihoodFighting against the common enemy of COVID-19: a practice of building a community with a shared future for mankindTrace, Quarantine, Test, Isolate and Treat: A Kerala Model of Covid-19 ResponseCovid-19 Pandemic- Pits and falls of major states of India.
title_abstract_phrases: Test positive rate, test per confirmed case, recovery rate, case fatality rate, and percent distribution of active cases were computed.To assess the previous and current Covid-19 situations in these states indicators such as Active rates, Recovery rate, Case fatality rate, Test positivity rate, tests per million, cases per million, test per confirmed case has been used.Fighting against the common enemy of COVID-19: a practice of building a community with a shared future for mankindThe outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has caused more than 80 813 confirmed cases in all provinces of China, and 21 110 cases reported in 93 countries of six continents as of 7 March 2020 since middle December 2019.The Rise and Impact of COVID-19 in IndiaThe coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic, which originated in the city of Wuhan, China, has quickly spread to various countries, with many cases having been reported worldwide.Social and administrative issues related to the COVID-19 pandemic in Pakistan: better late than neverThe study critically reviewed Pakistan’s provincial updates of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and discussed the current challenges faced by the government in a given context.
